SELECT P.P_ID, P.P_TITLE, P.P_ADDRESS, P.P_CHECKOUT, WM_CONCAT(DISTINCT B.P_EXTRA) AS P_EXTRA, COALESCE(MAX(R.REVIEW_AVERAGE), 0) AS REVIEW_AVERAGE, P.P_CHECKIN, P.P_REFUND, MAX(A.ROOM_PRICE) AS ROOM_PRICE, WM_CONCAT(DISTINCT A.ROOM_TYPE) AS ROOM_TYPE, MAX(A.ROOM_OPTION) AS ROOM_OPTION , P.P_STAR FROM PROPERTIES P INNER JOIN P_ROOMTYPE A ON P.ROOM_ID = A.ROOM_ID INNER JOIN P_EXTRAS B ON P.P_ID = B.P_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RESERVATIONS S ON S.P_ID = P.P_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON S.REVIEW_NUMBER = R.REVIEW_NUMBER
WHERE P_ADDRESS LIKE '%${P_ADDRESS}%'
AND A.ROOM_CAPACITY >= '${ROOM_CAPACITY}'
AND P.P_ID = B.P_ID
AND B.P_EXTRA LIKE '%${P_EXTRA}%'
AND P.P_STAR = '${P_STAR}'
AND P.P_STAR = '${P_STAR0}'
GROUP BY P.P_ID, P.P_TITLE, P.P_ADDRESS, P.P_CHECKOUT, P.P_CHECKIN, P.P_REFUND, P.P_STAR
